verses.name: Daniel 2:35
verses.text: Then was the iron, the clay, the brass, the silver, and the gold, broken to pieces together, and became like the chaff of the summer threshingfloors; and the wind carried them away, that no place was found for them: and the stone that smote the image became a great mountain, and filled the whole earth.

verses.name: Daniel 2:36
verses.text: This is the dream; and we will tell the interpretation thereof before the king.

verses.name: Daniel 2:37
verses.text: Thou, O king, art a king of kings: for the God of heaven hath given thee a kingdom, power, and strength, and glory.
